name: Miratech
overview:
-International IT service and consulting corporation with headquarters in Kyiv, the capital of Ukraine, and research and development facilities in major cities of Ukraine -Experience in international projects and value chain optimization since 1989 -CMM maturity level 3 engineering organization since 2003 -ISO 9001:2000 certified since 2001 -Serves Fortune 1000 companies -The leading Ukrainian IT company -Software engineering and BPO operations centers in several major Ukrainian cities -Cisco, CMU/SEI, Genesys, IBM, McAffee, Microsoft, Oracle, Rational, Sun, Veritas certified personnel

Today Miratech is an IT service and consulting corporation that delivers a unique blend of real-business experience with a strong engineering, international project delivery and value chain optimization expertise.

Since 1989, Miratech has performed hundreds of projects in various industries for clients in more than 20 countries. Being one of the first private software companies in former USSR, today Miratech provides the world’s leading companies with information technology, business process optimization and automation, and consulting services.

With a fast and firmly growing presence in the American and European markets, Miratech gained in-depth experience in executing international projects for multinational customers, implementing services off-site and on-site.

Miratech approach to technology and business process optimization helps its customers to overcome their budget and resource challenges and to increase their competitive advantage.

Miratech was wholly owned by management until the end of 2007. Since 2008, 60.1 % of Miratech shares are owned by EDB Business Partner, a leading IT group of Northern Europe. 39.9 % are owned by Miratech top management.
